Retreats

My good friend Nina and I run special bespoke and intimate retreat for those wanting to restore and explore both their inner landscapes and the beautifully rugged and high vibrational land in Australia.

We invite you to reconnect and revitalise your body, mind and spirit. Take this opportunity to press pause and let us look after you!

Dates

Monday 16th August 2pm to Friday 20th August 10am

Location

Magnetic Island, Townsville, Queensland

Weather

Average August daytime temperature 22 - 26°C. Lowest 15°C nightly

We offer

  • 4 nights holiday home accommodation by the sea
  • Daily morning yoga
  • Daily restorative evening practice
  • Welcome pack to thank you for joining us
  • All mats and props for the practice (bring your own if you like though)
  • Hikes to explore Magnetic Island x3
  • Creative Wellness Workshop
  • Nourishing plant-based meals
  • 30-minute Reiki treatment
  • Community connection
  • Time to rest and/or explore
  • Ferry transport
  • Ferry terminal pick up and drop off
